General.Name: AGV Products Corp
General.Description: AGV Products Corporation engages in the manufacture, processing, and sale of canned food in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company offers drinks, beans, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, and pickles. It is also involved in the rental and sale of public housing and commercial buildings. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Chiayi Hsien, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 11, Kung Yeh Second Road, Chiayi, Taiwan
